name: Illicium
description:
In this 2D top down survival game, the player avoids the light and is trying to survive in the deep sea. The player will encounter some enemies on his way, use the light to move the player away from enemies and make him survive!

Controls:

Mouse movement to move the light and to push away the enemies.

Do check out our gameplay video.

PS: This game was made by a team of two developers, so the art isn't great :P
